docs.snippet: The Washington Nationals are in danger of another first-round knockout after earning the top seed in the National League playoffs....

docs.snippet: This season’s playoffs have been exciting, but they also are demonstrating a need to shorten the length of games....
docs.lead_paragraph: This season’s playoffs have been exciting, but they also are demonstrating a need to shorten the length of games.
docs.abstract: Keeping Score column; slowed-down pace of this season's MLB playoff games, combined with late starting times, have games ending after midnight on the East Coast, which is not ideal for a sport hoping to build its fan base.

headline.main: As M.L.B. Playoff Games Enter Wee Hours, Case Grows for a Quicker Pace
headline.print_headline: As Playoff Games Enter Wee Hours, Case Grows for a Quicker Pace

docs.lead_paragraph: Kansas City shook off an early 1-0 deficit and rolled to an easy victory, advancing to the American League Championship Series, where it will face the Baltimore Orioles.
docs.abstract: Kansas City Royals defeat Los Angeles Angels, 8-3, to sweep division series and advance to American League championship series for first time since 1985.

headline.main: Royals Skip Extra Innings for a Change and Sweep the Angels Away
headline.print_headline: Royals Skip Extra Innings for a Change and Sweep the Angels Away

docs.snippet: The ball bounced off the pavement and Yordeni Caballero swung, whacking it with a soft thud and hurling his bat to the side as if he'd hit a homerun. As the 7-year-old raced down a street-turned-cricket pitch, his coach shouted instructions about ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The ball bounced off the pavement and Yordeni Caballero swung, whacking it with a soft thud and hurling his bat to the side as if he'd hit a homerun. As the 7-year-old raced down a street-turned-cricket pitch, his coach shouted instructions about a sport that's barely known in Cuba.

headline.main: Cricketers Fight for Foothold in Baseball-Mad Cuba
headline.print_headline: Cricketers Fight for Foothold in Baseball-Mad Cuba

docs.snippet: The melee erupted outside Xtreme Lounge, where three people were shot, one of whom died, and two people were slashed, the police said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The melee erupted outside Xtreme Lounge, where three people were shot, one of whom died, and two people were slashed, the police said.
docs.abstract: Melee erupts outside Bronx club with crowds of young men pummeling and slashing at one another until gunfire erupts, killing 24-year-old clubgoer Dennis Rodriguez; one male clings to life after bullet struck his head and four others have range of injuries that signals an all-out brawl with an array of weapons.

headline.main: One Killed and Five Hurt in Fight Outside a Bronx Club
headline.print_headline: One Killed and Five Hurt in Fight Outside a Bronx Club
